channel.title: [pi] Need an urgent fix
channel.description:
Basically, if you have dds and u spec, then on your 2nd spec as u spec u switch to ags and u ht like a 60+ with dds spec and you normally get downed.
I really need this fix...
My msn is antonyharding2255@hotmail.com

item.title: [pi] Need an urgent fix
item.dc:creator: @pyro_sauce pyro sauce
item.description:
@pyro_sauce wrote:

extinct2255:

Cant wear an item while ur specing …?

yea, basically if u spec and try to wield an item mid spec you will have to wait like 2 game ticks till the item wields so u can get both hits finished before u have the bonuses of the ags so u wont hit 60-60 cos u will only have the bonuses of the dds. i have no idea what file its in but im thinking wearitem or something you add a if player is doing spec delay the wield by like 2 game ticks till they can wield the weapon
and the most important part:
FEED ME THE CODE WHEN U FIGURE OUT HOW TO DO IT.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Need an urgent fix
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

extinct2255:

Stop the switching so when u switch u dont spec a 60+ wiht dds spec lol

I believe it has to do with the update method and has some bug with it my best answer is to look through the special method and the ags and dds methods to see if there is an obvious fix otherwise I don’t think I would be of any help with this! Sorry I couldn’t be more helpful.
